title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama LLM & embedding support to the LangChain ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic Ollama REST client and CLI helper.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: NPM package adding an enhanced interactive CLI for chatting, pulling and benchmarking models.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Collection of VS Code & JetBrains plugins that connect editor copilots to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, RAG extras.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot that proxies group chats to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models into Discord servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Modular retrieval-augmented generation toolkit using Ollama embeddings + Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama4j client beans and REST controllers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull via Ollama with benchmarks.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: HN thread comparing Ollama performance vs llama.cpp and discussing GPU offloading tips.

title: ollama-reddit-r-localllama
summary: Reddit announcement of Ollama v0.1.2 adding Llava vision model support and multi-modal chat.
